## Color3.Lerp() method

Creates a new Color3 with values linearly interpolated of "amount" between the start Color3 and the end Color3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Lerp(start: Color3, end: Color3, amount: number): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>Color3</code> | defines the start Color3 value |
|  end | <code>Color3</code> | defines the end Color3 value |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the gradient value between start and end |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

a new Color3 object
